usage: Current events impact analysis and performance correlation

dataMapping.title: Current Events Impact Analysis
dataMapping.subtitle: Real-time analysis of event impact on media performance and audience behavior

metrics.primaryLabel: Event impact category (e.g., 'Audience Engagement Impact', 'Revenue Performance Impact', 'Content Consumption Changes')
metrics.secondaryLabel: Category description (e.g., 'Event-driven audience behavior changes', 'Ad revenue fluctuations during events')

items.primaryLabel: Specific impact metric (e.g., 'News Content Consumption', 'Entertainment Content Decline', 'Ad Revenue Drop', 'Social Media Engagement')
items.actualLabel: Current event impact description (e.g., 'Breaking news drives engagement spike', 'Entertainment viewing declined')
items.targetLabel: Normal performance baseline (e.g., 'Baseline engagement level', 'Pre-event performance')
items.forecastedLabel: Recovery projection (e.g., 'Expected stabilization', 'Projected recovery to baseline')
items.isPrimary: Boolean - highlight as primary event impact metric
insights: Event impact insights (e.g., 'Breaking news drives 45% increase in real-time engagement', 'Weather emergency increases mobile streaming by 80%')
risks: Event-related risks (e.g., 'Entertainment content consumption declining by 15%', 'Ad revenue may drop 25% during crisis period')
recommendations: Strategic recommendations (e.g., 'Pivot content strategy to news-adjacent entertainment', 'Increase weather-related content during storm season')
